name: QFMouseKeys

screenshots.caption: Very simple and easy to use

short_description:
QF - QuickFast
2.april.2013 - V1.1 released - Fixed reset button, clearing with rightclick and more

Simple & small-in-size (~50kB) mousekeys with 7 saveslots for different settings.

One click/one action & no pre-defined spots, so it is allowed on online games such as Runescape.
If you play Runescape oldschool / 2007, I recommend checking out: http://sourceforge.net/projects/silver07/

Tags: mouse key Genie Windows keymouse
